text:
Negative: Range is around 85 km, Issues are charging time 0 to 100 around 6.5 hours, charging point is not easy to acess, seat folding is not a good one, understorage is not good

Positive: I have vida v1 since 10 months done 6500 kms, no issues such , ride quality is excellent abs brakes in front are damn good,.
Dc  Fast charging at 0 t 100% in 60 minutes, It is best among competition
